title: The Dockside Deception
synopsis: An informant is found dead by the foggy docks, just hours before he was set to expose a major smuggling ring. The police rule it an accident, but you're not so sure.
fullStory: Mickey 'The Rat' O'Malley was a dockworker with big ears and a bigger mouth. He was set to meet you with a ledger detailing the operations of a local smuggling ring. Instead, he was found crushed under a stack of 'accidentally' fallen cargo crates. The police seem eager to close the case, but the fog on the docks hides many secrets.

suspects.name: Silas 'The Shadow' Black
suspects.shortInfo: The notorious smuggling kingpin Mickey was informing on.

suspects.name: Maggie 'The Hammer' Riley
suspects.shortInfo: The corrupt union boss who controls the docks.

suspects.name: Finn 'Jonesy' Jones
suspects.shortInfo: Mickey's nervous partner, who was seen arguing with him.

evidence.name: Book of Matches
evidence.description: A book of matches from 'The Siren's Call', a bar known to be Silas Black's territory, found in Mickey's pocket.

evidence.name: Overheard Argument
evidence.description: A witness heard Mickey's partner, Finn, yelling at him 'Being a rat will get you killed!'

evidence.name: Falsified Shipping Manifest
evidence.description: A shipping manifest for the fallen crates, showing legitimate goods. The manifest is signed by Maggie Riley, but the cargo inside the broken crates is clearly smuggled electronics.
